 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 3.2 - PREDICTABLE
CONSISTENT IDENTIFICATION(LEVEL AA)
On accessible websites...

Components that have the same functionality within a set of Web pages are
identified consistently. 

These websites...

Make Web pages appear and operate in predictable ways.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
 Example 5: Save icon 

A common "save" icon is used through out the site where page save function is
provided on multiple Web pages. 

I still don't really understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/consistent-identification.html#examples]
 Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)  * Subscribe
